Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, we are pleased to hear our rooms, beds, breakfast, and staff all met your expectations during your visit and look forward to serving you again in the near future.

Summary: My mom & I love to stay here when we come out from Vegas to visit our extended family,  this time we brought my 15 month old son as well. Despite him falling & cutting open his forehead on the dresser, we had a nice stay. Breakfast is great & the woman helping in there is very kind & helpful. The staff can be more kind by greeting you & saying hello when you enter. Just small simple things to show more goes a long way. The pool looks very nice as well, but it was not warm enough to join. The shower would also change from very hot to very cold each day of our stay. Mirror looked as if it wasn't cleaned prior. Bathroom overall could be cleaned better. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose our Days Inn when in town visiting family, we are delighted to know our staff and facility continue to show you the great customer service you deserve; we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: First off the phone didn't work. When I tried to connect to their internet that didn't work so I took my computer down to the desk (Remember the phone doesn't work so I couldn't call for help) to see if they could help and of course they couldn't. Then in the morning there was 2 taps on our door and entry was made immediately despite the do not disturb sign on the door, my son was literally caught with his pants down or actually try to put them on to answer the door. Then after waking us up I had to use the restroom, when I was done I tried, yes I said tried to flush the toilet but there was no water, it had been turned off. Remember our phone wasn't working so we had t get dressed and go down to the desk. We were left with feces in a dry toilet for 15+ minutes, that took an
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about all the issues you had during your stay at our hotel and will make sure they are all addressed so this does not happen again during your future visit.

Summary: Other than the issue with the elevator in lobby not working and the Hot water not working our stay was good. the rooms were clean, and the service was friendly. the hotel was clean and inviting. all in all it was a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we are happy to know you enjoyed your overall stay with us and you had a nice clean room with great service; we hope to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: the room was clean,  breakfast sufficient, but we did not have any hot water in the mornings for showers! Three days with very cold water.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you had to experience that inconvenience during your stay but are glad you did not allow that to ruin your stay; we look forward to seeing you again the future.

Summary: Not knowing what to expect since the price was the lowest I could fine. I was pleasantly surprised. It was clean and the beds were comfy.  I will stay here again when I visit La Habra. The staff was great and check in and out was fast.
Manager Response: We are delighted to learn we exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed your comfortable room; we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: We were in the area for a family gathering, so needed something local.  We were greeted promptly, and as we were being checked in, were told that we may not have hot water since the water heater was being fixed.  OK.  Not a great start, but it turned out that we had plenty of hot water for showers.  The room was clean, the beds were okay and since all we were going to be doing was sleeping at night, that was all that mattered.  The bonus was having a breakfast in the morning.   The only bad part was that there is only one elevator (other than the service elevator), and it works when it wants to.
Manager Response: We hope you enjoyed your time in Fullerton visiting family and are happy to your room and continental breakfast met your standards; we hope you choose again when visiting in the area.

Summary: When I book a hotel I always look here to see other travelers reviews and their pictures. Based on the research and reading a lot of reviews I expected more from this particular hotel. We choose this particular location because we wanted to have access to LA and as well as, to stay close or with easy access to the HWY 15 to go to Las Vegas. Everybody complained all the time about LA traffic, so we decided to book something that for our needs would be the best of both.  It is quite far from LA Downtown, Hollywood, Beverly hills and all this tourist places people want to see while there. However is close to Disney. The hotel entrance is very nice, clean, big, high ceilings, it seems it has been renovated not a long time ago. We arrived very late at night, but we were advised that
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback and will make sure our management looks into your suggestions so we can better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: From the time I checked in to the time I left, this hotel was great. The hotel staff was very pleasant. The room was super clean. The lobby was inviting and had the newspaper available at no charge. The breakfast room was clean & well stocked. This all adds up to 'A Very Comfortable Stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review after your visit to our location, we are delighted to know our staff showed you the great customer service we strive for at Days inn; we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The room was clean. The beds were very comfortable.  Our family of four had a very nice stay while in town for Biola graduation and Disneyland.  The staff was extremely warm and helpful.    As others have mentioned, the biggest frustration was the shower: it would go from blistering hot to icy cold and back again regularly.  (We were also on the fourth floor.).  The elevator broke down while we were there but they seemed to repair it quickly.  The continental breakfast was okay, with waffle iron, pastries, yogurt, and mediocre coffee (Starbucks is a block away).    Regardless, for the price, I would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your room, our cleanliness and friendly staff made your family's overall stay with us a great one; we hope to see you again soon at our Days Inn.

Summary: Poorly functioning hot water, at least on the fourth floor.  When checking out I complained to the desk clerk.  She indicated that it was because of worn out piping in the building (common problem in Co. Cal ) BUT not my problem as a  guest.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review, we are sorry to hear about the issues you had with your room but glad you had a good overall stay with us at Days Inn.

Summary Heading: With the family but business related
Summary: It was nice and comfortable room. The hot water was limited because of a boiler problem but I was told that before I checked in and discounted for the inconvenience ($6). The breakfast didn't have much to choose from. And the coffee didn't have flavor creamer. Other than this I liked it.
Manager Response: We are delighted to know you enjoyed your room and you were accommodated as best as we could; we hope you choose us again in the future.

Summary: The property was better than many of the places I stay in, but my stay could have been better. I arrived at the hotel at 11:30 pm and was tired from a long day. The desk agent informed me that the hot water was not working in the hotel, and gave me the option to cancel my reservation. How can you operate a hotel with no hot water?   At that hour, I didn't want to cancel, but wasn't happy about the hot water situation. I took a cold shower and made the best of it.   The bed was not very comfortable, nor were the pillows. The next morning I tried the hot water and it was working. I think it was working the whole time, and the desk clerk gave me wrong information.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear our hot water was not working at the time of your arrival but are glad it worked the next day and we did our best to accommodate your needs; we hope you choose us again in the future.

Summary: This is a clean hotel good for families or alone. Unfortunately the washing machine broken but the staff did tell me that before I checked in. One thing that should be changed is opening of the back door. We parked in the back initially and you can't go in after 9:00 pm. They should let customers have a card to swipe it open like other places.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback we will make sure management hears your suggestions and are happy to know we met all your needs during your visit; we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Improve the beds and the water hot/cold adjustment was not working right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback we will make sure management hears your concerns so we can look into them before your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: We enjoyed our two night stay.  The decor was nice,  the...
Summary: We enjoyed our two night stay.  The decor was nice,  the room comfortable and the staff friendly.  Of he four rooms our family shared we did experience a light musty odor in one of the rooms, WiFi that randomly went on and off and low water pressure plus inconsistent water temp in one of the showers.  All in all it was a good stay and we would return if in the area again as well as recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your two night stay at our hotel and that our staff was friendly throughout your visit; we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: My third stay here. Nice big comfortable room. Wi-fi worked really well this time in room. Breakfast is decent, with a nice selection. Though the hotel appeared to be full, by the looks of the parking lot, the evenings and nights were very quiet. Overall very pleased. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We always enjoy hearing from our return guests that we are continuing to do a great job; we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The place was clean and nice. There were only a few things that could be better. The shower head is very low and my husband is a tall man. So it made it hard for him. The water kept changing from cold to hot. The roof had spots where it was leaking. That did not effect our room though. Also our phone did not work. When we reported it they fixed it right away. The room was clean and did not look out dated. It is in a nice neighborhood. We felt safe there. Breakfast was a little more then just your regular breakfast. It was still good. I would go there again and recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and will make sure our management hears your suggestions so we can make your next visit that much better.

Summary: Stayed for business.  Because of availability, stayed in a King Suite, which is really just a larger King Room (not just a little larger, but significantly so).  The mattress was very comfortable, and the housekeeping was johnny-on-the-spot in the mornings (would stop back mid-to-late mornings and the room was refreshed already).  The breakfast was lacking (hard-boiled eggs and waffles) but there are alternatives within walking distance.  The reception staff was helpful, and the price was right for a business trip.  I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your business travels, we are glad we were able to accommodate your needs and you enjoyed your room; thank you for the recommendation we look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: We were very pleased with the accommodations at Days Inn & Suites. The overall appearance was neat and clean and the room was comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was more than adequate and the lady working each morning was pleasant and helpful in every way possible.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us at Days Inn and that you felt comfortable during your entire visit; we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: My son booked us a room here for our trip to Disneyland. The hotel is about 9 miles to Disneyland but seems further. He was a little concerned what the surrounding area would be like as he got a great price for our 2 night stay. But knowing we wouldn't be spending much time in the hotel he was trying to save a few $$. We were surprised when we pulled in. The hotel seemed to be in good shape in a decent location. The lobby was large, clean and beautiful. The staff greated us upon walking in. We had an easy check in, no problems. Elevator a little small but there never seemed to be much of a wait. All rooms are accessed via indoor lobby/elevator. So you may have to carry your luggage a little. Opening the door to our room, again we were pleasantly surprised. The rooms were fairly
Manager Response: We are happy to hear we exceeded your expectations when checking into our hotel for your Disneyland trip and that our breakfast, staff and location met your needs; we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Good, solid, clean hotel, especially for the price.  Pool was nice, perfect temperature, well maintained.  Staff I interacted with were pleasant and friendly.  There is a little road noise from Imperial, but not horrible.  Breakfast was free, although pretty limited selection (toast, bagels, cereal, danish, muffins, etc.). We opted to skip breakfast two of the days to hit the McDonalds next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review after your stay with us at Days Inn, we are happy to know that our price, cleanliness and staff all met your standards; we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Poor, My room air condition stop working about 2:00 am one...
Summary: Poor, My room air condition stop working about 2:00 am one night, I call the front desk, the front desk person said we don't have a maintenance man on duty at night. One morning we needed  some extra towels. The front desk didn't have anymore, so we had to wait for the cleaning  crew to show up at 8:00 am. The hallways on the four floor was always hot.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations during your visit and that you had to experience these issues. We will make sure we look into how to handle these situation better in the future so your next stay will be a great one.

Summary: Recent stay at this hotel was very good.  We stayed one night.  Room was clean, breakfast was very good - waffle maker, toast, bagel, coffee, juice, cereal.  Came from cold climate, so it was nice to be able to eat outdoors and enjoy the warmth.   Special thanks to the front desk on the restaurant recommendation (El Cholo) - it was super!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback and are delighted to know your room, our continental breakfast and staff all met your needs and hope we see you again at our Days Inn.

Summary: excellent place to stay.  room very clean, luggage cart but hard to find, coffee maker, refrigerator and microwave in room.  got a suite instead of a regular room.  didnt ask but got it.  compliment breakfast but didnt part take. all carbs.   unable to get on the internet though.
Manager Response: We appreciate the five stars after your recent stay with us at Days Inn, we are happy to hear you enjoyed our rooms and amenities; we look forward to serving you at our location soon.

Summary: Very quick and courteous check in. Rooms very clean  and quiet. Breakfast was good. Excellent price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review, we are pleased to hear you had a great overall stay and that our staff showed you the customer service we strive for; we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: AC didn't work and it was 97 outside, finally got it cool on the second night by leaving the door open to the hallway. Nice towels
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are sorry to hear the AC in your room was not working but happy to know you had an overall good stay with us; we hope to see you at our Days Inn soon.

Summary: While the hotel is a bit aged, it is very comfortable. The bed and pillows were great. The only issue is the hot/cold/hot of the shower. But that can be attributed to an older hotel. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us a review and are happy to hear we met all your needs; we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: When we arrived the light was out in the bathroom, they did fix it the next day.  The beds were very uncomfortable, my back still hurts 5 days later.  The shower head is so low.  I'm a 5'6 man (relatively short) and I had to squat to be able to wet my hair and wash it.  As the head did have a "Massage head" I thought it might help with the low shower head, but alas, it did not adjust.  Finally, the breakfast of waffle, oatmeal, yogurt, cheerios and bread left a lot to desire.  Many continental breakfasts have a variety of pastries (they did not) and either eggs, or some meats, but this did not.  I would highly recommend people go elsewhere.  Horrible experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback, we value our guests and want to know what we can do better to serve them in the future. We will make sure management hears your suggestions and will look into correcting them shortly.

Summary Heading: Excellent Value for Los Angeles area.
Summary: So glad we stayed there.  We based our LA visit out of this motel.   We booked for one night and got extended for two more.  The lobby is big and beautiful.  Nice elevator.  Room was spacious and very comfortable and new looking.    Not one problem.  Great free  breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review, we are pleased to know our location fit your traveling needs and our spacious rooms met your expectations; we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: It was in a good area, near many restaurants and shops, the room was clean and spacious, and the beds were amazing!!! I had a great night sleep there:) the only complaint I have is about checking in. The lady at the front desk didn't know what she was doing so it took forever...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback, we are pleased to hear you enjoyed our beds, your room was spacious and you had a great overall stay with us; we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: The hotel and room were clean. The problems I encountered were with the shower and a strange odor in the room itself. The odor was noticeable upon entering the room but went unnoticeable in a few minutes. Strange.  The problem with the shower is the height of the shower head. A person would have to be five foot tall or less to comfortably take a shower. Minor problems I know, but problems nonetheless.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review we are sorry to hear you had to experience some inconveniences during your visit but hope you enjoyed your overall stay with us at Days Inn.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, overall decent, although some issues
Summary: We stayed there for a few days in February for a nearby family event in a king suite room.  The one room is fairy large, with a king bed  a sitting / TV area and a table and chairs as a "dining" area.  There is a small fridge and sink in that "kitchenette" area as well.  The hotel is rated as a two star hotel, so as other reviewers have pointed out its important to acknowledge its pretty basic.  The Good:  The room was fairly clean, with one exception (see "The Bad" comments below).  Bed was reasonably comfortable.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  For example, we were actually getting multiple rooms for different family members, but one of them changed their trip to a day later than I booked for at the last minute.  The staff changed that room the day they were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review after your most recent visit to our Days Inn hotel, we are sorry to hear you had some issues during your stay but are pleased to know our staff did all they could do to accommodate your needs; we hope to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: If you aren't looking for frills and thrills, this property is for you. Basic, clean, no surprises. Breakfast was basically good, too. Some noise in the room next door. Guy must've hit the snooze 20 times from 4:30 a.m. on. Would have been nice to see a small fitness center on premises.
Manager Response: We appreciate you giving us a review after your visit and are glad to hear our hotel was clean and our breakfast was good; we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: A clean, spacious room with everything we asked for - HDTV, microwave, coffee maker, refrig... The bathroom was well kept.  Even at Christmas, the outdoor pool and the spa were heated just right - and were towels provided.  The breakfast better than the usual continental offering.  All for a great price.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words and the five star review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your room and all the amenities we have to offer; we look forward to your next visit at our Days Inn.

Summary: very nice stay for family holidays after big bear lake snow play, everythings nearby, fast food 24/7, walmart, Mall shopping, ect...
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review after your visit with us, we are delighted to know we exceeded all your expectations and you enjoyed your stay with us; we hope to see you again.

Summary: The front desk agent "Jesus" was very helpful and kind. He had a crowd of people in the lobby to check in and the phone was ringing, but did a great job taking care of everyone. The room was really clean, and the lobby looked nice as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we are pleased to know our staff showed you the customer service we strive for and was able to handle every situation; we hope we can serve you again in the future.

Summary: This was a clean, comfortable room and we would stay again. We thought that it was closer to Disneyland, but it is about a 25-30 minute commute. The breakfast is nothing more than a continental breakfast with a waffle maker, but it was enough for our needs.
Manager Response: We are grateful to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us at Days Inn and we were able to meet all your needs; we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Convenient but nothing to get excited about
Summary: The good features of this property were: the location, the price, the pool and the staff.  The room was adequate and appeared to be clean.  The mattress was stiff as a board.  I've seen it described as part foam and mostly cement.  That's pretty accurate.  At 5'4" tall even I had to duck to get under the shower spray.  That said, the bathroom was again, adequate and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are happy to know our price, location and amenities met all your needs but sorry to hear your mattress was not fully satisfying; we hope we can better serve you in the future.

Summary: It is a comforting feeling when entering the lobby. You already know the stay will be quiet and comforting. The rooms are clean. You do not hear noise coming from other rooms. I stayed in several rooms and they are all clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback and are happy to hear your room met your standards and you enjoyed your stay with us; we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: We enjoyed are stay at this location very much.  It's always kept very clean the whole property.  The workers are very polite and helpful and we love the fact that this location is kid friendly.  Thank you Days Inn Fullerton for being a nice place away from home. Only concern is the beds for this room seemed a little more harder than usual.
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are glad to know you enjoyed your overall stay with us at Days Inn and that our facility makes you feel like you're at home; we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Very clean room and a most friendly staff. Great wifi service! The hotel is very conveniently located on a major street that runs through multiple cities so it is very busy at all times. Next time (and there will be a next time) I will request a room that does not face Imperial Highway.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are delighted to hear our price fit your budget and that you enjoyed our friendly staff; we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: This place is in a good location near lots of restaurants...
Summary: This place is in a good location near lots of restaurants and of course Disneyland.  The rooms were a good size for families to share.  The beds are not very comfortable, so much so that we were fighting over the rollaway.
Manager Response: We are happy to know our location met you your needs but are sorry to know our beds did not met your expectations; we hope we can better serve you in the future.

Summary: After reading the reviews decided to stay at the hotel on our visit to Disneyland. Hotel was clean and comfortable. Loved the fact that there was plenty of room for parking our rv.  Only 5 or 6 miles from Disney. Easy to get in and out. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are happy to know we met your standards while staying at our Days Inn and that we were able to accommodate your traveling needs; we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel twice in the last 6 weeks and enjoyed it both times. I stayed in 2 different rooms on the 3rd floor. Both were clean and spacious and everything in the rooms worked. One of the rooms I had a very large bathroom. The color scheme on this floor is pink and green. The staff were friendly and helpful on all 3 shifts. Breakfast was good - especially liked the oatmeal and fact that they had some protein offerings like hard boiled eggs and yogurt. The breakfast attendant always had a smile each morning. There are a variety of restaurants nearby. Downtown Brea is about 2 or 3 miles from this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to visit our Days Inn location, we are pleased to know all our staff showed you the customer service we strive for and that you enjoyed our free continental breakfast; we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: There are few hotels in this area that are worth staying. This hotel is worth staying if you are looking a place to stay while in the Brea - La Habra area. Clean but on the older side. The breakfast is good for what it is. We where able to make our own waffles.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we are happy to know our location met your traveling needs and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This was our second time at this motel which is lke a hotel since the rooms open to the inside.  We enjoyed the two lobbies.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review after your stay, we are delighted to know you had a great overall experience; we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: The bathroom needs some updates.  Shower head real low.   Room was clean and comfortable.  Good price for what you got.  Nice breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear your room and clean and comfortable and will make sure we look at your suggestions for your future visits with us.

Summary: needs minor/inexpensive things, like replace the worn-out toilet seat.  The paint is all worn off. YUCK !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we will make sure management hears your suggestions so we can make sure your next stay is that much better.

Summary Heading: Nice staff, reasonable rates, good breakfasts, decent rooms, slow internet
Summary: This hotel is a few blocks from my mother's house and I stay here whenever I visit her. Generally, things work really well, with some glitches. On this last visit (5 nights), the internet was not working well. When I could log on, it was really slow or would log me off. That said, the breakfasts were always laid out nicely and the staff are really nice. The pool is clean and no one else was using it. The exercise room did not open until 10 AM, so I never used it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent traveling needs, we are sorry to hear you experienced some issues during your stay but are glad our breakfast and staff met your expectations; we hope to better serve you in the future.

Summary: This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in, the manager, staff, housekeeping are all rude. If you do not mind having to go and replace coffee, towels,etc. by all means stay here. Oh and if you expect people to speak english, don't
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear we fell short of meeting your expectations and that our staff failed to show you and your husband the customer service we strive for at Days Inn. We will make sure this gets addressed in a timely manner to insure this never happens again.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 days and the experience was great. Free breakfast in the mornings was wonderful. The rooms were clean and very comfortable. It was very close to Fullerton College where my grandson goes to college, which was great for us. Would definitely go back and stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review, we are pleased to hear you enjoyed your overall stay and that we exceeded your standards; we look forward to seeing you again at our Days Inn soon.

Summary: Hotel was clean when I walked in and received help right away. Room was clean and nice. Nothing fancy, but an upgrade from motel 6. Free wifi and continental breakfast a big bonus. Breakfast consisted of make your own waffles, oatmeal, cereal, danish, coffee, juice, yogurt, fruit and hard boiled eggs. we are a family of four and we all enjoyed the breakfast. Only negative was the coffee. Wife said it was no good.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our location and being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are glad to know our staff showed you the customer service we strive for and that you enjoyed your overall stay; we look forward to seeing you again at our Days Inn location.

Summary: Nice, clean, relaxing stay with courteous staff.  I'd stay here again if I come to visit this town in the future.
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are delighted to hear our staff, rooms and continental breakfast met your traveling needs; we hope to serve you again.

Summary: We have stayed many times at this Days Inn and have always been pleased. This time was no exception , tho unfortunately most of our stay the internet was down, and I was unable to use my laptop. The staff is always very friendly and accommodating and the breakfast room is now serving scrambled eggs on weekends a big plus !
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing our location for your traveling needs, we are always happy to hear we continue to please our guests and our staff shows the customer service we strive for; we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here as part of a large group of family members in town for a special occasion. There were over 40 of us in about 8 rooms. All enjoyed the stay without exception!. When we were at the room and, not out and about we enjoyed the pool which was clean and the water warm-not heated, as well as the hot tub which operated just fine. The location was on a HWY, yet noise was not an issue. Check in was scheduled for 3pm but we called ahead and asked for an early check in and were allowed to check in at 1pm. Lastly the FREE WI-FI was appreciated! We would definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Days Inn for your most recent travels, we are delighted to hear everyone in your group enjoyed their stay and all our hotel has to offer; we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: My mother-in-law had the room with the ant problem.  We told the hotel and the first time, they sent a maid to clean up.  Then, they said they would have to call the exterminator.  They offered no compensation, just a simple, ok.  The breakfast is either, cereals, bread, cream cheese, yogurt, juice or eggs.  The bananas were iffy and there were no other fruit selections.    The pool had no towels available the whole stay (3 nights). The room was ok, the mattress was on the firmer side.   The possitive about the stay was the location.  It is in the heart of shopping areas, food restaurants and walmart is only a few minutes away.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear your mother-in-law had a bad experience in her room and we will make sure we speak to our staff so they can handle future situations better. We hope we get a chance to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: I regularly stay at this hotel and enjoy it very much. Very clean, good facilities and the Parking is plentiful. Wifi works well and full cable TV so home away from home. Rooms are spacious and well equipped. Not a huge selection for breakfast (cereal, muffins, eggs, waffles, yogurt bread) but good if you spend as much time away as i do.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star rating after your most recent stay with us at Days Inn, we are always pleased to hear from our return guests and enjoy knowing that we continue to meet your needs; we look forward to serving you again soon.

Summary: The elevator was broke, shower head old and poor water flow. Didn't waste time with breakfast.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear we fell short of meeting your expectations during your stay but we will make sure we make the proper adjustments so your next stay will be better.

Summary: I recognize that hotel stay isn't the easiest due to where people's heads are at and their different noise tolerance, but if this hotel would just put up signs on the large floors to discourage running up the hall and especially slamming the doors, that would make so many of our lives better and give this room 5 stars. I am in awe how people just don't think to turn their door knobs to prevent making it slam at all hours. It's literally impossible to sleep when that happens unless you are terribly sleep deprived which you will become when staying here more than one night like I did. Otherwise, the room is very nice and comfortable enough, but the bed under-sheet needs washing because it had hairs on it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we will make sure management hears your suggestions so we can better serve you upon your next stay.

Summary Heading: very clean, nice staff, and delish breakfast.  Love that...
Summary: very clean, nice staff, and delish breakfast.  Love that place.  Would stay there more often if rooms were avaiable !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our location and also for being a Wyndham Rewards member. We are delighted to hear our hotel staff, cleanliness and continental breakfast all met your needs and hope we get to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for a week in July, we had no complaints at all, the staff were friendly and helpful whenever we had a question, breakfast was good I'm not a breakfast eater but my husband and the kids always went down and waffles fruit and yogurt.  The room was clean pillows were maybe a bit harder then I liked but no big deal. The pool was great we had it to our selfs most of the time but at an it was always clean. We would stay here again for sure the price was fantastic!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we are glad to know you chose us for your week long vacation and that we met all your needs; we hope to serve you again in the future at our Days Inn location.

Summary: We were able to recently stay at the Days Inn in Fullerton,California for 9 nights.  It was a great experience for many different reasons.  We found the rates to be a really good value as included a continental breakfast also and that was with a good variety of items (including making your own waffles).  The room and whole hotel areas we accessed were clean and the housekeeping staff very helpful for working around our schedule to do their job.  The desk staff were always courteous and ready to help with any questions we had.   There is a well kept pool area that includes a hot tub also.  Though we did not use it at this stay, due to our schedule, we enjoyed it when stayed here before and saw others enjoying it when there now. It would have been nice to have the pool open a
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback and also for giving us a five star rating. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our rooms, rates, value, continental breakfast and are friendly staff during your stay; we look forward to seeing you and your family again real soon.

Summary: Everything from the lobby, pool area, breakfast area and rooms were very clean.  The staff was very nice.  The room was quiet and the beds were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review, we are excited to hear we exceeded all your expectations and that your room met your needs; we cant wait to serve you again.

Summary: Desk staff were friendly but never should say a guest's room number out loud for security reasons.  Also greatly concerned over the great number of bug bites I woke up with in the morning!!  Breakfast was very nice and the breakfast hostess was wonderful. Love the room amenities. Excellent!
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are delighted to hear your had an overall nice stay with us and that our staff was friendly; we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The exterior of the hotel offers a glimpse of hope but the interior shatters any perception of a pleasant stay. Everything from the lobby to the my room's front door is draped in despair with a mild hint of musk. Aside from the hotel itself, the front desk associate's service and capability vexed me beyond grace. She was slow and inefficient and did not know how to answer any of my questions without walking away for a minute and coming back just to answer either yes or no. You would think after manning the front desk for the entire day already, she'd know the proper reply already without having to scramble and confirm.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing out hotel for your traveling needs, we are sorry to hear our hotel and staff did not meet your standards, we will make sure to speak to them so they have a better understanding about how to answer all your future questions; we hope to better serve you in the future.

Summary: The service was great.  The room was pleasant and spacious. The location was good too.  The best part was relaxing in the spa, after work.  The only problem was the light in the bathroom kept flickering.  But over all, our stay was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review after your stay, we are happy to know our spacious rooms, location and amenities met your standards; we look forward to your next visit with us at Days Inn.

Summary: Our stay was more than we could have hoped to experience.  Our room was spacious, clean and comfortable.  The continental breakfast was like eating in a restaurant.  There were literally an ongoing influx of guests but it was so well  organized we did not miss out on any of the several choices available for breakfast. The front desk personnel were over-the-top in their effort to meet our every need.  This Days Inn is highly recommended by our whole family and we would definitely come again when in the area!  I am also inspired by this Days Inn to check for a Days Inn wherever we travel!
Manager Response: Days Inn Fullerton would like to thank you for choosing our hotel and being a Wyndham Rewards member. We appreciate the five star review and are glad to know our breakfast, spacious rooms and staff all exceeded your expectations; we can’t wait to serve you again.

Summary: This hotel is a few blocks from family and we stay here when we are unable to stay at their home.  Very convenient and rooms are very nice & quiet.  A very good bargain.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing Days Inn Fullerton for your most recent travels, we are happy to know our location fits your needs and our rooms are nice and quiet; we hope to see again soon.

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable. Good value for the price. The free breakfast wasn't anything to brag about, but if you want good coffee, Starbucks is a 2 minute walk from the hotel. The staff are not outgoing in making you feel welcome, but when engaged they are friendly. I was overall satisfied with my stay.
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback after your stay, we are glad to know your room and our price met your standards and we will make sure we speak to staff about customer service to better serve you in the future.

Summary: This hotel was great! The staff were so accommodating and friendly- everyone of them. The rooms were very nice, large and very quiet. We were on the back side of the 4th floor. The breakfast was very good, they had Belgian waffles, bagels, toast, rolls, croissants, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, banana's, juices, coffee and milk. the area was very large to sit in and very clean. We did not use the pool, but did sit out on the patio for lunch. thank you all!
Manager Response: We appreciate the five star review and thank you for choosing our Days Inn for your traveling needs. We are glad to know we exceeded your expectations with our staff, rooms and breakfast; we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: The Staff was Fantastic, the room was spotless, the morning Breakfast hit the spot! Great Price and it was a Terrific Stay. We even suggested your Hotel to a friend who's Daughter is getting Married , for out of town Guests. Thank you so much Days Inn Fullerton Ca
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review, we are delighted to hear our staff showed you the customer service we strive for at Days Inn and that you enjoyed your room and our complimentary continental breakfast. Thank you for the referrals, we hope to see you again.

Summary: Our room was fine, but the bathroom fan was very noisy, and the bathroom lighting had this weird 'flicker' to it that was annoying, especially for the first 3 minutes or so after being turned on each morning or evening. It was clean, and not torn up or anything though, but did face the main street, and the pool area, so picked up noises from that direction. The neighborhood was ok, and the grounds were fine. Staff was competent, but didn't do anything extraordinary or bend over backwards to help or assist in any way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we will make sure we take a look at your bathroom issues and also talk to our staff about the customer service we want here at Days Inn, we hope we get the chance to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Staff were not overly friendly, just kind of there. We did...
Summary: Staff were not overly friendly, just kind of there. We did get to use the fax machine which was great service in my opinion. The beds and pillows were uncomfortable this stay. The maids were kind and very helpful.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you were not shown the high customer service we strive for at Days Inn but are happy to hear housekeeping was kind and helpful; we hope to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: My new home away from home
Summary: I recently spent four days at the Days Inn in La Habra. I wasn't sure what to expect since I had just stayed at an upscale hotel in La Brea. I was very pleasantly surprised to find a very clean and welcoming hotel. I was meeting my sibling here for three of the nights and they were also quite surprised at the rate, pleasant room and breakfast included! I will be staying there in the future as my Mother has moved into the area and I travel from San Diego. The staff is very professional and nice and the owner plays a very discreet presence which I liked a lot. There are tour groups also staying here as well and from what I could see they were also enjoying their stay.
Manager Response: We at Days Inn appreciate the five star review after your most recent stay with us, we are delighted to know we exceeded your expectations and that our staff was friendly and helpful during your stay; we hope to see you and your family in again in the near future.

Summary: Like most, I found this hotel to be the most economical deal without being a flea bag motel. Upon check-in, it felt like immediately I wasn't trusted to not throw a kegger.  I'm a married 39 year old woman travelling with my husband, so pretty sure keggers are in my past. When registering, you have to sign off that you won't have any guests in your room after 10pm.  What?  My mother can't come see me at my hotel while I'm visiting?  Why am I being told that I can't have anyone else in my room to visit me?  All I can guess is this property must have had problems with parties in the past, but to tell your guests that are paying $75-$100/night for a room that they have a curfew is really odd. The reception workers were pleasant, but less than talkative.  The cleaning staff seemed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback after your stay, we are sorry you were less than satisfied with your room. We will make sure management hears our concerns and suggestions so we can better serve you and your husband in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice property, large room, fun pool
Summary: We stayed 5 nights at this Days Inn, and really enjoyed in.  It was very clean, with modern decor, and a really nice lobby.  The breakfast was fairly typical - juice, yogurt, hard-boiled eggs, waffles, toast, bananas, oatmeal cereal.  The only real complaint I would express is that the only elevator is extremely slow.  And in a crowded morning with checkout or going to breakfast, you must be patient.  Price was good for the season and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Days Inn for your five night vacation, we are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean facility, complimentary continental breakfast and price all met your standards; we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We found the Staff, Service and Rooms all to be Excellent! I would recommend the Days Inn to anyone who was looking for a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star rating, we are delighted to hear our staff, service and rooms all exceeded your expectations; we can't wait to see you and your family again.

Summary: The front  enter made looked nice but the carpets were filthy disgusting. The room was small. Arabs up shower only room was small. Did not feel safe.
Manager Response: We at Days Inn would like to thank you for choosing us and being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are sorry to hear we fell short of meeting your expectations during your stay. We hope we get a chance to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: This hotel is always clean and pleasant to stay at after a...
Summary: This hotel is always clean and pleasant to stay at after a hard days work. Everyone is very friendly which I appreciate.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing our location for your recent travels to Fullerton. We are happy to hear our hotel cleanliness and staff friendliness met your expectation again; we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Clean, nice staff, enjoyed the continental breakfast ( oatmeal, boiled eggs, Danishes, bagels, juice). I would stay again!
Manager Response: At Days Inn we would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing our hotel for your recent traveling needs, we are happy to hear you were satisfied with your stay and enjoyed our continental breakfast we offer to all our guests; we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I always liked staying at Days Inn because I think they are affordable and clean but this last weekend that we stayed there I was really upset because aster a long night we just wanted to sleep in. Early before check out time around 8.07am the housekeeper knocks and starts screaming outside.  I got up and was walking towards the door and she for cell tried to come in to the room. I couldn't understand what she was saying and let her know and she left. We couldn't go back to sleep because it was very scandalous.  I reported to the front desk of what had happen and they didn't seem to care. They just said okay to us. For sure I will not be going back here.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you experienced some issues during your visit and will make sure management is aware of your concerns so we can better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: This hotel is in a convenient location for us, and the...
Summary: This hotel is in a convenient location for us, and the rooms are a pretty good value. I wish the pool had later hours, we would have used it much more and enjoyed our visit more. There were many smokers during this visit and our visit last summer, and they smoke directly outside the lobby doors. We traveled with an elderly man and dropped him off at the door, and there was almost always someone between the driveway and door smoking and we had to walk (slowly) through the smoke. The breakfast area is not nearly big enough, and many items run out about an hour before the end of the breakfast time.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback after your most recent travels, we are happy our location was convenient and our rooms met your standards. We will make sure management hears your suggestions so your next visit will be that much better.

Summary: Good location for us, short drive to the university. Whatever items you needed were nearby at Brea shopping centers. On Friday, there were 6-7 gourmet catering trucks just a short walk down the street- every Friday I was told. That was great. Good staff, great housekeeping, and we were on the 4th floor poolside-no problem with internet wi-fi at all. We will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are glad you enjoyed your stay and our staff showed you the customer service we strive for at Days Inn; we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times.  It is very close to family in the Fullerton area.  We were there for a family wedding.  Rooms are always nice, breakfast OK, but nothing great.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards Member and choosing our hotel for you recent travels to attend a family wedding. We are glad our location and rooms fit your needs again; we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The room provided was clean and spacious. If that's all you need, you're set. But the wi-fi was spotty/slow and the elevator broke down. This hotel definitely shows its age and there aren't many extra amenities. The breakfast was a huge disappointment. It was mainly breads and pastries. Locals told me they don't generally recommend this hotel, but it does provide a clean room for a rate lower than most in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback, we are happy to hear your room met your traveling needs but are sorry to hear you less than satisfied with our continental breakfast; we hope we get a chance to better serve you in the future.

Summary: We stayed here after a long day in hospital with our daughter.  It was pleasant to be greeted by Naomi who helped us at registration. When the first room was not suitable for us, she was caring and efficient and gave us another that would work better.  I recommend asking for a room facing away from the road noise on Imperial.  The room was large, clean and inexpensive in comparison with other sites and included a continental breakfast.  This was a very good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review and for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are happy to hear our staff was able to accommodate your needs during your stay and we hope your daughter is doing well. We hope to serve you again at our Days Inn location.

Summary: Very clean room. Friendly and helpful staff,  Very quiet. We had to extend our stay twice and it was hassle free.
Manager Response: We appreciate you being a Wyndham Rewards member and are delighted to hear your room was clean, our staff was friendly and they did all they could to accommodate your needs; we look forward to serving you soon.

Summary Heading: Average.. Not bad.. You pay what you get.
Summary: Our experience was good overall. The front desk is really friendly they helped us right away and did everything we asked for. The bad thing was that when we arrived to our room the sheets were either dirty or stain. I went to the front desk and they apologized and switched us rooms. However, it just left us somewhat worried of how clean is this place really was. The location was convenient, it very close to Target, Jack in the Box, Carl's Jr, and Starbucks.
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are pleased your overall stay was good and that our staff showed you the customer service we strive for. We are sorry to hear you felt worrisome about your room but know that we take great pride in our housekeeping staff; we look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Except for a few relatively minor complaints, our stay at this hotel was good, and I'd stay there again. The woman taking the reservation was awful, and I'd prefer having a bathroom light switch that didn't also turn on the fan, but overall we had a good stay. The room was spacious and clean, everything worked, and the continental breakfast was just fine––especially considering the AAA price of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing our hotel for your recent travels, we are pleased to hear your overall stay was a good one and you enjoyed your room and our continental breakfast. We hope we get a chance to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: The breakfast seemed to be there more for the staff.  When we were sitting there we watched many staff members eat their breakfast off the line.  Now let's talk about the food, or lack of. The two hot items were oatmeal and waffles.  The three pastries were not very good.  There was a few bananas in a bowl, but no other fruit.  Some toast and bagels.  Also a small refrigerator with a few yogurts in it. That was about it.   The rooms were okay.  The beds were pretty hard. Now, our biggest problem...our rental car, someone tried to break into it.  There was marks from a screwdriver on the driver's side door.  This car was under the light in front of the hotel.  We asked the staff about the lot.  We were told that this is a very safe area.  We have never had that problem.  Would I
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we are sorry to hear you experienced some issues during your stay; we will make sure management hears your concerns so we can better serve you in the future.

Summary: Great location quiet plenty of places to eat.  Breakfast not bad but no meat. Plenty of parking. The bed and pillows could use improvement.  Too hard for me.  bathroom need repairs in the shower. Overall, it is good enough, I will stay here again.  The staff  is great and always helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we are sorry to know we did not fully meet your expectations but are happy to hear our location, staff and overall stay was great; we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Poor Job at the Front Desk Clerks!
Summary: I had experienced a severe discrimination!!! I got hot water to shower only after I told the front desk that I won't report to the management level after 3 hours of argument with the front desk hispanic clerks! You should provide hot water to shower to all guests without discrimination!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review, we are sorry you feel you were discriminated against, however, there is a zero tolerance for that at Days Inn and we will make sure to speak to our staff on how to better handle situations like this in the future.

Summary: Overall was a good stay, the hotel is about a 15-20 minute drive to Disney, and about a 40 minute drive to Hollywood ! Rooms are very spacious, and nice considering how cheap the price of a room is for one night ! The shower head in the bathroom is very low - if you are taller then 5 foot 3 you might have a problem, or you can just duck a little to wash your hair ! Walls are pretty thin, we could hear the vacuum, people talking and doors shutting.Just a note, ask for a room away from the parking lot !! This is a Spanish community, however everyone is fairly bilingual ! No one wore name tags, and the front desk staff did not have uniforms - our house keeper was a sweet heart, the tall man at the front desk is very nice and always willing to help, but the lady working the night
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you experienced some issues with one of our staff and we will make sure to address this issue immediately, however, we are glad to it did not take away from the experience we strive for at Days Inn. We hope to serve you again in the future.

Summary Heading: I certainly enjoyed my stay at Days Inn in Fullerton, CA...
Summary: I certainly enjoyed my stay at Days Inn in Fullerton, CA. Room was lovely, I was pleased to have a little fridge. Great bed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, we are glad to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us; we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This was a great hotel and staff.  good area -- convenient.  clean room and accommodating staff.  Had the best price for the location I needed/wanted.  i needed a place to rest after a medical appt -- it was perfect for ME.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear our hotel fit your needs and that our location was great; we hope you heal quickly and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Usually have a decent stay ... This time the smoke detector beeped all night. Front desk couldn't offer any help as there is no maintenance person at night. Spoke with front desk upon check out and was offered a discount. I thought I should receive a free night since I listened to the beeps all night long. She couldn't authorize that and gave me the managers info. I emailed him and heard back quickly. He offered 50 percent off of that night or a free night on our next trip. That's what I was looking for and I believe that was a reasonable request. Thank you for a quick reply and we will be back in about 2 months.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and for choosing Days Inn Fullerton for your most recent traveling needs. We are pleased to hear our staff did their best to accommodate your needs and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: A decent hotel. Staff was friendly and helpful. Room was worn, but clean. Late checkout was not a problem. Biggest improvement would be to put CFL lighting in the elevator. Three 15-watt incandescent bulbs is not enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Days Inn and also for being a Wyndham Rewards member, we are glad to hear our staff was friendly and we were able to accommodate your late check-out. We hope to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: ...because the room fits our needs to a T!  They are large, clean, well furnished, have comfortable beds, and include amenities such as AC, fridge and microwave.  We liked that rooms are accessible via an inside elevator, and not from the outside; this added to our sense of security.  Breakfast is exceptional with hard boiled eggs, waffles, yogurt, fruit and more!  We enjoyed the use of the fitness area on our last visit, it is well equipted.  We were grateful for the use of the washer and dryer as well.  The manager, JayJayyusi, is very helpful and runs a fine hotel.  Housekeeping and kitchen staff are very friendly and helpful.        We plan to return to this hotel whenever we are in the area and highly recommend!
Manager Response: We appreciate the five star ratings and are happy to hear our hotel, rooms, amentities, breakfast and staff all exceed your expectations visit after visit; we look forward to all your future stays with us at Days Inn Fullerton.

Summary: I still don't know why I haven't been given My free stay.  I've been staying with Days in for about three Years. The Fullerton hotel and  the one on Beach Blvd.                                    Paul
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you are having an issue with your free stay, we will see what we can do to solve this issue in a timely manner.

Summary: Decent hotel, accommodations were adequate but could use some updating. More of a variety for complimentary breakfast would be nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments; we will make sure management hears your suggestions so we can better serve you upon your next stay.

Summary: The night clerk at the counter was very helpful. My room was clean and comfortable. The only thing my room didn't have was a mini fridge, big deal.  The price was great for this room, a double queen. Overall the hotel was well kept, clean and traveler friendly. I would most certainly stay there again.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear our staff was helpful with any and all of your questions and concerns and that your room and price met your standards; we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We live locally and we are doing a remodel in our home.  We are currently staying at the hotel for 7+ days with kids.  The hotel is clean, pool and hot tub great, nice continental breakfast, the room is a good size and convenient microwave and small refrigerator. This would get five stars for the exception that the bed mattresses are hard and too firm.  We didn't sleep well and woke up sore every day.  But for the price, 20% off when staying 3 or more nights, we can deal with firm mattresses.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are pleased to know you chose us for your extended stay during your remodel and that our pool and amenities are an added bonus; we hope to serve you again in the future.

Summary: My wife and I were presenting a marriage seminar at a near by church and this work very well for us. clean convenient and good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and choosing our hotel for your travel needs, we are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you soon.

Summary: The Fullerton location was an excellent central location for visiting several relatives in SoCal; convenient to freeways in all directions.  It was close to downtown Brea also, which has excellent restaurant choices and it was nice to be able to stroll the area with nice music playing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback, we are happy to hear our location fit your traveling needs and that you were able to enjoy the surrounding area; we hope to serve you in the future.

Summary: Was in room 220.Was awakened shortly after falling to sleep.Being bitten by bed bugs.Called room service & was given another room. After another shower,didn,t get to sleep until after midnight.Which made the next day very uncomfortable.Thank god my family wasn,t on this trip.And I hope their not in my home.If so you will here from my lawyer.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention we will make sure we get this taken care of in a timely manner.

Summary: This Hotel was a pleasant surprise. The hotel was very clean and the front desk service was pleasant a professional. Only stayed one night, but will stay again next year when in town for a Trade Show.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear we exceeded your expectations during your stay and that our staff showed you the professionalism we strive for. We look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary Heading: I had made a reservation in advance for this room and they...
Summary: I had made a reservation in advance for this room and they had no reservation for me in  their system. They did have one king room left and they let me have it. At about 9PM i received a call for someone from days inn and the number was from memphis tn and they wanted to know if I was going to check into my room or not and wanted me to go to the hotel within the next 30 minutes to check in. I told him that I had already checked in and got my room. I don't know what he said, as I hung up and he was very hard to understand.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback, we are sorry to hear that there was some miscommunication with your reservation; however, we are pleased to know our staff took care of you the best way they could. We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: The hotel was clean and housekeeping was excellent throughout. The maid service should be complemented for a job well done. The only complain was the ice machine on the 4th floor was out of order for the duration of our stay( 5 nights).
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we will make sure housekeeping is informed about your kind words and also make sure the ice machines are maintained properly. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: If Only We Can Stay Longer!
Summary: It was a great stay and quite cheap compared to the other inns that are around the area. The rooms are quite large to what we have expected. The extra bed that we requested for one night is bad. It was better to sleep on the couch. Could have just asked for an extra pillow and blanket for our friend.
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and for choosing our hotel for your traveling needs. We are happy to hear our hotel rooms and price fit your traveling budget; we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is one of the cheaper hotels in Fullerton, and I wasn't expecting much.  But we found a quite, well-kept place with a central location for the Fullerton - La Habra area.  Breakfast is included and the usual variety of breakfast foods are available buffet style.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Days Inn location for your most recent travels, we are glad to hear we exceeded your expectations and you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope we get to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: Don't come to this hotel if your an African American. Had one staff member tell me that a few of my friends couldn't come up to the suite that I payed for with me. I lost my room key and when I went to go to the desk to get another she said that security will escort me to my room but I guess security was nowhere to be found so she decided to give me another room key. She also told me my friends were being watched in the security camera when they weren't doing anything but stand by the elevator. And every time one of my black friends came into the hotel she forced them to sit in the lobby. I didn't automatically assume racism until one of my Hispanic friends came into the hotel and she didn't tell him anything nor did she force him to sit in the lobby. I thought it was complete
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and we appreciate your feedback. On behalf of all my staff I assure you we are not in the practice of showing racism although we are in the practice of providing safe and clean accommodations to all our guests. Part of our registration process requires registrations of all guests with valid identification. On occasion individuals are unable to provide identification so we will ask them to please wait in the lobby for the registered guest. This is not based off race or anything other than comfort and safety of our guests. If our staff was inconsistent in this policy I apologize and will address this inconsistency immediately. We take very seriously the comfort and safety of all our guests in which we must have control of who is coming and going. We understand and apologize you felt singled out although rest assured we would do this to all guest entering our facility regardless of race. We thank you for your previous business and understand when in Fullerton again you will make other choices for your lodging needs. We wish you a comfortable stay and visit when you do come again to our area.

Summary: We have stayed here several times.  Every one does a great job from the front door in.  You can be proud of your staff!  This locations is close to our kids and we use it often, whenever we need to have a family function.  We live in Lancaster and do not see to travel at night so this really works for us!
Manager Response: It is always nice to hear from our return guests and know that our staff is continuing to show you the customer service we strive for; we look forward to seeing you and family again in the near future.

Summary Heading: It was a great stay but the first morning killed it
Summary: The place was great, nice clean and somewhat cozy, Staff was nice .. the one thing that"ruined" it was that house keeping was banging on my door at 8:30in the morning... really??? they were banging on all the door and talking to a number of people it upset them as well,knock knock knock knockknockknock housekeeping knock knock knock house keeping .. i thought it was a dream   so make sure you use both locks, or you may get a walk in on you sleeping.. or doing  other things..  if i wanted to wake up that early  iwould be going to work and  NOT on vacation!
Manager Response: Days Inn would like to thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards member and for choosing our hotel for your most recent traveling needs. We are sorry to hear about your inconvenience and will talk to housekeeping on a better way to check on our guests in the early morning, we look forward to any future visits you may have with us.

Summary: This hotel is at a great location,very clean, and convenient to places we wanted to visit.  We enjoyed the free breakfast, wifi, and parking.  It was lacking a pool lift which is becoming more of a necessity for us.  Our one complaint is that when we tried to turn on the air, we were blasted with mold and dust.
